actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act with respect to the labeling of foods which are manufactured or produced outside the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require labeling as "imported" any food product manufactured or produced in whole or in part outside the United States, including the percentage of its ingredients so produced and the place where they were produced.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act with respect to the labeling of foods which are manufactured or produced outside the United States.
